About

Here is a little background

My name is Thomas and Ive been on my journey to get a 2 year degree in software and web development for over a year now. I defenitly dont want to stop there. I enjoy programming and coding so much that most of my leisure time is spent researching and creating new project implementing all different kinds of languages. Right now im working as a machine technician at General Electric and although I've done a fair amount of U.R Robot programming, I know I can be way more valuable in a field that I am very passionate about, Tech! My longterm goal is to eventually land a tech job that will allow me to code proffesionally while also being able to contribute to help the company grow and be as effecient as possible

Projects

Case Studies 1 of 1: Meet-Up App

This react meetup app was a project worked on during a udemy course that involved using react hooks, functions, standard CSS, and a firebase database. With this app, you're able to add a new meetup through a form and store it in the database. The home-page collects all the meetups from the database and displays them. Lastly, there's an option to add or remove a meetup to and from 'My favorites'.
